entry.title: Populists vs. Elites: The Battle for Western Civilization (and Armenia)

media:group.media:title: Populists vs. Elites: The Battle for Western Civilization (and Armenia)
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of CivilNet's podcast, Eric Hacopian delivers a no-holds-barred analysis of the global political landscape, dissecting the French elections, Iranian Presidential elections, European parliamentary shifts, and the looming US presidential race. He addresses the influence these events can have on Armenia and its nascent western reorientation.
Also watch: https://youtu.be/KDLfAjPUoEA

media:group.media:title: Food and Flavors of Dilijan
media:group.media:description:
Varda Avetisyan is a successful restaurant owner in Dilijan, Armenia, although she did not always think that would be the case. In her youth, she had the opportunity to leave Armenia and study in Chicago. After graduation, she realized that sharing her food with the community was what would bring her the most fulfillment in life, and she moved back to Armenia. Watch Varda share her experience in Armeniaโs restaurant industry and talk about why she lets chasing her happiness drive her career.

ยซิฑึึีกีญีตีกีถ ีคีซีฟีกีถีฏีตีกีถยป ีฐีฅึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีฉีธีฒีกึีฏีดีกีถีจ ิบีกีถีถีก ิฑีพีกีฃีตีกีถีถ ีธึ ีีซีฃึีกีถ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีจ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีด ีฅีถ ีีฅีฎ ิฒึีซีฟีกีถีซีกีตีซี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ึ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปึ ีฐีกีถีคีซีบีธึีด ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีฅีฌีธึ ีฑีกีญีธีฒีพีกีฎ ึีธึีฑีจึ ิฑีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑ ีง ีฏีกีฟีกึีพีธึีด ีถีกึ ีีธึีทีซีธึีด ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีฎ ีดีฅีคีซีก ึีธึีธึีดีซ ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิปีฌีฐีกีด ิฑีฌีซึีซ ีดีซ ึีกีถีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ

entry.title: Biking City: Is there hope for Yerevan?

media:group.media:title: Biking City: Is there hope for Yerevan?
media:group.media:description:
Riding a bicycle early in the morning in Yerevan is easy, there are no cars or people. But, can you ride a bike at any other time of day? Is Yerevan a city for cyclists? Armeniaโs prime minister is often encouraging the use of bicycles in a city that doesnโt have a single designated bike lane. Most cyclists are forced to ride on the sidewalk, which is neither pleasant nor safe.

ิตึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซีถ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีขีกีถีฅึ ีธึีฝีธึึีกีถีฅีฌีจี ีกีถีฏีกีญ ีถึีกีถึ ีฐีฅีฟีกีฃีก ีฆีขีกีฒีดีธึีถึีซึ, ีกึีคีฅีถ ีธึีถีซ ีฃีซีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีพีธึีธึีดึ ีีฅีถึ ีนีฃีซีฟีฅีถึ, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีน ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีฅีถ ีญีธึีกีถีกีฌีธึ ีดีฅึ ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีจึ ีีกีฝีถีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีขีธีพีกีถีคีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกึีกีฃ ึีธีญีพีธึีด ีง, ีซีถีนีจ ีงีฌ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีกีถีฐีซีดีถ ีง ีคีกึีฑีถีธึีด ีจีถีฏีกีฌีธึีดีจ, ีธึ ีฅึีฅีญีกีตีซีถ ีกีตีฝ ีฏีกีด ีกีตีถ ีฃีซีฟีฅีฌีซึีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีนีงึ ยซิฟึีฉีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฟีกีบีกีถีซยป ีกีตีฝ ีฉีธีฒีกึีฏีธึีดีจ ีธีน ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีซีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีกีผีกึีฏีกีถีฅึีซ ีกีถีฐึีกีชีฅีทีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีงึ
